name: webpcss
description: postcss processor for prepare css to use webp images

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run jscs && istanbul test _mocha --report html -- test/*.js --reporter spec
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
